p: The Spanish Society of Ophthalmology, the American Academy of ophthalmology (AAG) and Optometry (AOA) suggests prevention measures, biosafety guidelines and the development of protocol to prevent the viral spread. One suggestion is the adoption of a triage before visual evaluation to decrease risks of exposure to SARS COV-2, and evaluation with only one companion when It is necessary. Another suggestion is the use of personal protective equipment (protective goggles, face shield gloves and N95 mask) by the health professional who will have contact with secretions 55, 56, 65
